Possible password list?...................
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Possible password list?...................
By Gearhead on Thursday, June 2, 2011 - 12:40 pm:

It says it in the name but is a password list possible on this game(regeneration password)? or does it change on who wrote it to easily? I own it but iv restarted many(6)times due to bad luck.

By Thorr on Friday, June 3, 2011 - 10:16 am:

1) You don't start the game with ability enter a password.

2) The handwriting recognition isn't spot on. It does fairly well and if your writing is consistent then it will work. However, writing style plays a part.

3) Handwriting only works for certain groups of monsters. Some monster types are Drawing only. Some are Writing only. Some are audio only. Audio generally has the weaker monsters. Drawing is mid-range (except for the Zodiac monsters.) Text is for the high-end.

By Gearhead on Friday, June 17, 2011 - 10:24 am:

I know, but multiple attempts with a friend's password lead to same result.( Got three breeds that were locked at the time and then got the monster I was going for.)

By Gearhead on Friday, June 17, 2011 - 10:26 am:

By Summit_trainer on Sunday, September 18, 2011 - 01:57 pm:

I got a Dragon/Joker from all capital MASTER, worked several times in a row...

By Thorr on Tuesday, September 20, 2011 - 07:52 am:

Yeah, I use the MASTER password a lot. So long as your handwriting is legible to the program, you CAN get consistent results. The problem arises in that one's own consistent writing may be repeatable yet when another person writes the same thing, the game simply doesn't recognize it.
